Player History
Drafted in 60th round, 960th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Injured on 7/12/2015 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/28/2015 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2016, off James Buono (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/28/2016, off Lawrence Cadiz (SF)...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/12/2017 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,528,571 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Cincinnati to Boston on 2/1/2019 (Going to BOS: SS Santiago Collado, P Juan Cardoso. Going to CIN: 1B Raul Rivera, LF Cedrick Fernandez)...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago on 6/3/2019...
Injured on 6/5/2019 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/8/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
